completion.item: <[!CDATA[Adds an item to this itemParameters: gara.jswt.TreeItem item - the item to be addedThrows: TypeError - when the item is not type of a TreeItem ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the child containerReturns: the child container ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns wether there are items or notReturns: true wether there are items or false if there are non ]]>

<[!CDATA[Internal method for creating a node representing an item. This is used for creating a new item or put updated content to an existing node of an earlier painted item.Parameters: boolean wether - this item is at the bottom position or not ]]>

<[!CDATA[Internal event handlerParameters:
Event e - W3C event
